document_data.name: Mosque of the Irreducible
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Mosque of the Irreducible''' was a temple located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

This mosque was found in [[Furnace (district)|the Furnace ward]] of the city.
document_data.Description: The Mosque of the Irreducible was constructed from [[silver]] that was polished to a mirror shine.
document_data.Activities: This temple was dedicated to [[Freya|Freyal]]â€”the [[efreeti]] name for Freya, an ''[[Midani dictionary|ajami]]'' goddess of love, passion, and fertility.
